file_content.text: My thanks for your help.
I have the Republic mining equipment.
You do... incredible.
You've salvaged my entire operation. I owe you a tremendous debt.
There was no other choice.
Still, you could have left me to my failure. I will not forget.
So start paying.
I... err, yes, of course.
Is there more?
I can ask nothing more of you.
You're on your own now.
I won't make the same mistake twice, I assure you.
I'd best see to my next objective now. Again, my thanks.
If we can get our hands on that mining equipment, we'll be striking a heavy blow to the Republic's efforts.
You're here for me, I take it. For the record, I accept full responsibility for the incident.
I should have ordered a second fighter pass to ensure that Republic reinforcements didn't reach the crash site before us. I have failed in my assignment--do as you must.
What are you talking about?
That isn't why I'm here.
That isn't why I'm here.
No? I see. Perhaps we can still salvage the situation, then.
Cut the gibberish.
Then... perhaps we still have time to correct the situation.
My squadron downed a Republic transport carrying advanced mining equipment. Ground teams were sent to seize it, but the Republic got there first.
That equipment will quickly put the Republic's mining efforts ahead of our own. We cannot allow it to remain in their hands.
Leave it to me.
I cannot thank you enough for assisting in this matter.
A bit of action sounds good.
Resistance is likely to be heavy. You won't be disappointed.
Our scouts tracked the Republic recovery team. The equipment is being held at these coordinates.
Good hunting.
I don't care. [Refuse quest]
Err... yes. Of course. I'm sorry to have troubled you.
For the Emperor!
